net.proteusframework.ui.column

Class AbstractDataColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.column.AbstractDataColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataColumn, TableDataColumn, TreeDataColumn
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedValueColumn, PropertyColumn

    public abstract class AbstractDataColumn
extends Object
implements DataColumn, TreeDataColumn, TableDataColumn
    Convenience implementation of a TableDataColumn and TreeDataColumn.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
